casebody.data:
David A. MAPLES, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
STATE of Michigan, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 159863
COA: 343394 Supreme Court of Michigan. August 8, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellee to extend the time for filing its answer is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before August 19, 2019.
